TopicTitle: Is it possible to import NASA height data into RSS?, if so How?

Articles.Content: I've been trying to figure out RSS and importing some KK statics into places like New York, but I realized the Hudson River is missing, is there any way i can import satellite data into RSS height maps to make features like rivers appear in it?

i think you need to edit it or add another KK static with a 3d modelling thing like blender, then export it into ur ksp. (which is going to be a nightmare)

unfortunately i don't know any better solution. 

also, just asking, why do you need the Hudson River in ksp? are you planning to launch a sea dragon in it?
